entries.name: dfdxi(f,fx,x,i)
entries.desc: Computes the derivative of f at x. fx is the value of f at x.

entries.name: isEqual(a,b,zero=0.0,e=1.0e-8)
entries.desc: Determines the equality of two numbers by comparing to zero, or using the epsilon value

entries.name: jacobian(f,fx,x)
entries.desc: Computes the Jacobian of f at x. fx is the value of f at x.
